activities: Personal information relating to employees, other workers, customers and business partners may be received in the United States from the European Union and may be used internally within human resources, finance, accounting and/or operations functions.
industrysector: Electrical Power Systems - (ELP)General Services - (GSV)Oil & Gas Field Machinery - (OGM)General Industrial Eqpt & Supplies - (GIE)
personaldata: All personal information relating to all employees or other workers as well as customers and business partners that is received by Global Power or one of our subsidiaries in the United States from sources in the European Union, in any format or medium
privacyprograms: Employee Data Privacy Policy and Safe Harbor Policy
recoursemech: We have selected the European Data Protection Authorities Panel as our external dispute resolution mechanism for handling all types of complaints in the event that we cannot resolve it internally.
